scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/ea-timeline.js -c -m -o build/ea-timeline.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/ea-timeline.js ../d3.github.com/d3-sankey.v0.3.js && cp build/d3-sankey.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-sankey.v0.3.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-sankey.v0.3.js d3-sankey.v0.3.min.js && git commit -m "ea-timeline ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/ea-timeline.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/ea-timeline.js build/ea-timeline.min.js
